name: Password Knowledge
description:
passwords.

Hello, i made this game for Cybersecurity Game Jam .

You want to tell the weakest password among the listed passwords. Play it on Full screen It will give you a better experience. This game will enhance your knowledge about passwords and hot to make them.

#All the information in game about password is taken with the help of google.

#Do not use passwords listed in this game as they were cracked and had been added to a lot of Word Lists..

Provide me Your Feedback about the game I will surely reply and think about your ideas.

Thanks..
